extension_description.message: 為機構部署 Firefox 並提供舊版瀏覽器支援。

redirect_title.description: The title of the redirection page. Also shown in the Firefox title bar.

error_title.description: The title of the redirection page if an error has happened while trying to load the alternative browser.

redirect_message.message: 系統管理員已設定 Firefox 透過替代瀏覽器存取 $url$。
redirect_message.description: Text shown on the redirection page while the alternative browser is started.

browser_error.description: Error mesage shown if the redirection has failed.

wrong_protocol_error.message: 發生通訊協定設定錯誤，因此無法開啟 $url$。請與系統管理員聯絡。
wrong_protocol_error.description: This error is whown when the action page is invoke with a hash tag specifying an address that is not in the http/https protocols.

learn_more_message.message: 進一步瞭解舊版瀏覽器支援。
learn_more_message.description: Message shown on the bottom with a link to a (potentially) internationalized 'learn more' article
